title: Anyone else getting blank screen rather than guest wifi login page?
content: I've now found at two public places that my 4xl and my wife's 3a will not load the sign in page. First time was a restaurant and now a campground. At the campground, my 15 year old laptop, upgraded to Windows 10 laptop had no problem....
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
